meanings.sent1: The cat made a subtle movement to avoid being seen.
meanings.sent2: Her subtle perfume lingered in the room long after she left.
meanings.sent3: The subtle hint of a surprise party made him suspicious.
meanings.sent4: His subtle smile revealed his true feelings.
meanings.sent5: The subtle change in the painting went unnoticed by most viewers.

meanings.sent1: The subtle flavors of the dish delighted her taste buds.
meanings.sent2: Her subtle choice of colors in the painting created a beautiful harmony.
meanings.sent3: The subtle twist in the plot caught the audience off guard.
meanings.sent4: The subtle intricacies of the design amazed the art critics.
meanings.sent5: The subtle elegance of her dress turned heads at the party.

meanings.sent1: His subtle way of asking for help without directly saying it impressed her.
meanings.sent2: The author's subtle criticism of society was woven throughout the novel.
meanings.sent3: The subtle sarcasm in his tone made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her subtle manipulation of the situation went unnoticed by most.
meanings.sent5: The subtle humor in the movie had the audience laughing out loud.
